name: df-line2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cline2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cee, cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cee, cv(s3))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s2), cec(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(ccolin)))))))
comment: Define the ` Line ` function. This function generates the line passing through the distinct points ` a ` and ` b ` . Adapted from definition 6.14 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Oct-2013.)
